replies.msg: 哇朴寶劍先生太睇得起我喇 梗係5系啦！

congratulations to her! Her songs have met with great critical acclaim including Oriental Daily, Hong Kong Economic Journal, Southern Daily, south China Morning Post and various cultural websites. By the way I got held up in traffic yesterday for fifteen minutes. The bus beside me was sounding her horn along the way. There's always a lot of traffic on this road even though last saturday the traffic was unusually light. Normally there isn't much traffic after midnight, if not no traffic for that time of day. Nonetheless next time I'll leave home early so as to miss the traffic.
